
---
title: '绿联推出 MFi 能量彩虹数据线，高密编织 + 硅胶工艺'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/2/0e13aaf8-3fcb-4783-b7d6-4d915132db92.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sat, 12 Feb 2022 11:52:52 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/2/0e13aaf8-3fcb-4783-b7d6-4d915132db92.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="d471"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 2 月 12 日消息，据绿联官方消息，新款 MFi 能量彩虹数据线现已推出，售价 69 元。</p><p data-vmark="cc79" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/2/0e13aaf8-3fcb-4783-b7d6-4d915132db92.png" w="749" h="680" alt="图片" title="绿联推出 MFi 能量彩虹数据线，高密编织 + 硅胶工艺" width="749" height="680" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="f8ff">IT之家了解到，绿联这款能量彩虹编织数据线经苹果 MFi 认证，支持 PD 20W 快充，兼容 iOS 系统所有设备。</p><p data-vmark="fb3d">外观方面，绿联能量彩虹数据线共有天空蓝、薄荷绿、樱花粉、云朵白四种配色可选，采用了“高密编织（外）+ 硅胶（内）”工艺。官方表示，内里硅胶柔软有弹力，外壳以双色细丝通过加捻后进行 2+2 交错方式混编，使得编织材质紧密排列，结实耐磨。此外，还增加了加长网尾全包设计，在抗磨损的同时也抗弯折。</p><p data-vmark="c268">线芯方面，绿联能量彩虹数据线采用了苹果同款芯片和 C94 端子，使用了 194 根锡铜芯，辅以铁氟龙外被，增强了充电速度和数据传输，并且极大提高了阻燃性。</p><p data-vmark="57d8">充电方面，它支持 <a class="s_tag" href="https://iphone.ithome.com/" target="_blank">iPhone</a> 8~13 以及 <a class="s_tag" href="https://ipad.ithome.com/" target="_blank">iPad</a> 全系闪充、iPhone 6~7 标准快充；数据传输方面，基于 USB2.0 标准传输，速度达 40MB / s。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOEJK1olVA4HXFpcCE0XM28JGl4QXQYGV1xYDEMeMytXQwVKbV9HER8fA1UJWypcR0ROCBlQCgJDCEoWBmoIG18WXwMGXFdCUQ5LXl8MRzBSDRh-UTxaCx1Udw5STz1QKQ9yWFJtC0weCmk4GFkSXwAGUV1aOChwbTJLSz5IAgMHZFxcDUoWC19JdVwSWAMGVm5dC0wTAWoAG1sRbQYFUVtaD0wRA24IGVMlXQ4FZAIfWgpVM184GGslbQYyV24DZkpEA28NTFhAM1xJDxxfXxlFbW8PE1McWQECU25fCUoVAV8" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOIJK1olVA4HXFpcCE0XM28JGl4QXQYGV1xYDEMeMytXQwVKbV9HER8fA1UJWypcR0ROCBlQCgJDCEoWBmoIG18WXwMGXFdCUQ5LXl9jQyIXLxxVPD0VVDsNfz1_E19iR3hUWFJtC0oVB24JGFoVWjYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7AEVSMQMCDU4nA2o4WjUSWgMHUFxtCkoWAWcPHlgWWzYCU1tYD0wQBW8JGFoSbQYKU24BShlWQV84K1glbTYCZF1tViUWUG8IT15AXGhYHwUfChxDVwEIHFMTVA4CU15tCkoWAW04" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOEJK1olVA4HXFpcCE0XM28JGl4QXQYGV1xYDEMeMytXQwVKbV9HER8fA1UJWypcR0ROCBlQCgJDCEoWBmoIG18WXwMGXFdCUQ5LXl9LRQJ-W34LKDtHXClMdGxcZjwcBg9iWFJtC0weCmk4GFkSXwAGUV1aOChwbTJLSz5IAgMHZFxcDUoWC19JdVwSWAMGVm5dC0wTAW4NHV0RbQYFUVtaD0wRA24LHVglXQ4FZAIfWgpVM184GGslbQYyV24DZkpEA29YHA9CM1xJDxxfXx0fbW8PE1MTWgEGXW5fCUoVAV8" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380" data-jdid="10044115234598"><span
